revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Belphegor plasma | class = BelphegorBall | game = Skulltag }}[[Classes]]: {{Class|BaronBall}}→<u>BelphegorBall</u>
The {{Class|Belphegor}}'s attack uses the same projectile as the {{Class|BaronBall}}, but throws it at "Nightmare!" skill speed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>BelphegorBall</u> : {{Class|BaronBall}} { Speed 20 }
